00014 #ifndef PATH_NODE_H
00015 #define PATH_NODE_H
00016 
00017 #include "MC2String.h"
00018 #include "DeleteHelpers.h"
00019 
00020 #include <list>
00021 
00022 namespace Path {
00023 
00024 class NameNode;
00025 
00026 typedef std::list<NameNode*> NodeList;
00027 
00032 class NameNode {
00033 public:
00034 
00035    typedef NodeList::iterator iterator;
00036    typedef NodeList::const_iterator const_iterator;
00037    typedef NodeList::value_type value_type;
00038 
00040    explicit NameNode( const MC2String& name ):
00041       m_name( name ),
00042       m_attribNode( false ),
00043       m_isAttrValueNode( false ),
00044       m_multiNode( false ) {
00045       // empty names are strange
00046       // and so are single '*' names
00047       if ( name.empty() || name.size() == 1 ) {
00048          return;
00049       }
00050 
00051       // determine if this is a multinode
00052       m_multiNode = ( m_name[ name.size() - 1 ] == '*' );
00053       if ( m_multiNode ) {
00054          // this is a node we should check more than once.
00055          // erase the '*' so we can do normal name compare
00056          m_name.erase( m_name.size() - 1 );
00057       }
00058       // determine if this is an attribute node
00059       // '@' indicates attribute
00060       m_attribNode = ( m_name[ 0 ] == '@' );
00061       if ( m_attribNode ) {
00062          // cut out the attrib part of '@attrib'
00063          m_name.erase( 0, 1 );
00064       }
00065       // determine if the attrib has a value speciefied
00066       MC2String::size_type pos = m_name.find_first_of( "=" );
00067       if ( m_attribNode && pos != MC2String::npos ) {
00068          m_value = m_name.substr( pos + 1 );
00069          m_name.erase( pos, MC2String::npos );
00070          m_isAttrValueNode = true;
00071       }
00072    }
00073 
00075    const MC2String& getName() const { return m_name; }
00076 
00078    const MC2String& getAttributeValue() const { return m_value; }
00079 
00081    iterator begin() { return m_nodes.begin(); }
00083    const_iterator begin() const { return m_nodes.begin(); }
00085    iterator end() { return m_nodes.end(); }
00087    const_iterator end() const { return m_nodes.end(); }
00089    bool empty() const { return m_nodes.empty(); }
00090 
00092    bool isMultiNode() const { return m_multiNode; }
00093 
00095    bool isAttributeNode() const { return m_attribNode; }
00096 
00098    bool isAttributeValueNode() const { return m_isAttrValueNode; }
00099 
00104    void addNode( NameNode* node ) { m_nodes.push_back( node ); }
00105 
00107    void copyList( const NodeList& list ) {
00108       m_nodes.insert( m_nodes.end(), list.begin(), list.end() );
00109    }
00110 private:
00111 
00112    typedef STLUtility::AutoContainer<NodeList > AutoNodeList;
00113 
00114    AutoNodeList m_nodes; //< child nodes
00115 
00116    MC2String m_name; //< name of this node
00117    MC2String m_value; //< the value if a value is speciefied
00118    bool m_attribNode; //< true if this node is an attribute
00119    bool m_isAttrValueNode; //< true if this node has a value specified
00120    bool m_multiNode; //< whether this node should match more than one
00121 };
00122 
00123 } // Path
00124 
00125 #endif // PATH_NODE_H
